content: *celebrate the presidential election with this barack obama finger puppet -- a great way to teach your children about politics lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80658ad skill level easy wool-ease® article #620 a b c 3 colors 1 ball each *black cocoa oxford grey* d microspun article #910 1 ball *white* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers small amount of blue and pink yarn some construction required to finish see also 80657ad john mccain finger puppet 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/john-mccain-finger-puppet
